name: Sakura Spirit
summary: Judo rising star, Gushiken Takahiro, was about to have the match of his career when a visit to a shrine suddenly sends him to an unknown world. He finds two weapon wielding girls chasing… a pair of fox girls? As he gets involved with their antics, his world will never be the same.
info:
• 中文名: 樱花之灵
  • 发行: Sekai Project
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Adventure、Visual Novel
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2014年7月9日
  • 售价: $9.95/$9.99（steam）
  • 官方网站: http://winged-cloud.com/
  • 开发商: Winged Cloud
  • Specification: All Ages（大尺度）, No voice
  • 游戏介绍: http://www.mangagamer.com/detail.php?goods_type=1&product_code=120#story
